pages.title: Assembly Required
pages.text: If you are interested in four minutes and fifteen seconds of epic techno from your friendly neighborhood mod development team, look no further than this disc.$(p)To obtain it, combine any vanilla Music Disc with a Titanium Ingot and Lava in a Fluid Mixer.

pages.title: A Safety Hazard
pages.text: $(7)$(o)Caution: The dank beats made by NinjaKittens (Dax Flame) are the bomb.
